mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id, o.ordered_at, oh.quantity, p.title, p.detail, p.price, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.guide_name, o.is_confirmed FROM order_history oh JOIN `order` o ON o.order_id = oh.order_id JOIN package p ON oh.target_type = 'PACKAGE' AND oh.target_id = p.package_id WHERE user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY o.ordered_at DESC;

SELECT o.order_id, o.ordered_at, oh.quantity, g.title, g.detail, g.price, o.shipping_no, o.address, o.receiver, o.receiver_phone, oh.arrivalDate, o.is_confirmed FROM `order` o JOIN order_history oh ON o.order_id = oh.order_id JOIN goods g ON oh.target_type = 'GOODS' AND oh.target_id = g.goods_id WHERE user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY o.ordered_at DESC;

SELECT review_id , target_id , target_type , detail , created_at , rating , user_no FROM review WHERE target_type = #{targetType} AND user_no = #{ userNo } AND is_deleted = 'N' ORDER BY updated_at DESC
SELECT comment_id , content , created_at , updated_at , travel_mate_post_id , parent_comment_id FROM comment WHERE user_no = #{user_no} AND is_deleted = 'N'
